title: Jobs/internship Sydney?
body: Is there any realistic way I can land a job/internship at Riot Sydney? I'm a recent graduate of computing science and information systems from the Fiji Islands. My dream is to work for a company that makes products that I love,  and league is pretty much my favourite. Highest elo was gold 1 99lp in season 6. I have a diverse champion pool, and irelia main(700k mastery points)  Please if any rioter could help me out,  I love league and want to be a rioter.

replies.body:
Hey there,

The best way to look for a job for Riot is to apply via the website. I'd suggest doing a bit of research before you submit your application as it is a pretty sought after place of employment and you'd have to have a pretty impressive application to get noticed. 

* [Riot Games Careers](http://www.riotgames.com/careers)
* [Riot Games Internship Program](http://www.riotgames.com/internship-program)

GL ♥
